articles.title: 12 Stocks That Dropped After Tax-Loss Selling—and Can Bounce Back
articles.mainIdea: 12 Stocks That Dropped After Tax-Loss Selling—and Can Bounce Back
articles.summary: Barrons.com: 12 Stocks That Dropped After Tax-Loss Selling—and Can Bounce Back. The sale of underperforming assets to lessen stockholders’ tax burden can render some stocks undervalued. An Evercore screen can help you find names that can bounce back. Related tickers mentioned: CARR, CMCSA, CMCSV, MSTR, STRC, STRD, STRF, STRK, UNH.

articles.title: 3 Reasons to Avoid DOCU and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
articles.mainIdea: 3 Reasons to Avoid DOCU and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
articles.summary: StockStory: 3 Reasons to Avoid DOCU and 1 Stock to Buy Instead. Over the past six months, DocuSign’s stock price fell to $68.85. Shareholders have lost 9% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 12.9%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation. Related tickers mentioned: ^GSPC.

articles.title: Here are Citi's top market sectors for 2026 and 3 stock picks for each one
articles.mainIdea: Here are Citi's top market sectors for 2026 and 3 stock picks for each one
articles.summary: Business Insider: Here are Citi's top market sectors for 2026 and 3 stock picks for each one. Citi said it was overweight on info tech, healthcare, and financial stocks heading into the first quarter of 2026.
